tip:
PbIdea is PowerBuidler extension library, especially in the current situation of the development of the Internet, new medical insurance development, greatly improve the usability of PowerBuilder. 
 This library is free to use, and always free! 
 Some modules need development authorization, even if there is no development authorization, it is just some tips, and does not affect the specific function implementation. 
 Please check the menu.json file for the contents of this menu, which contains the corresponding relationship between functions and specific modules, so as to facilitate the search of specific functions. 

 free QQ:781770213

items.tip: Before you begin, it is recommended that you take a moment to read this note. nLearn about the basic features of the WebSuite library.

Let you write your own webapi services and websocket services in PB (don't need you understand .NET C# JAVA, etc., only need PB), provide data services for third parties or your own APP, or proxy external network interface access to the intranet.

items.text: National Medical Insurance Interface Related Implementation<VIP>
items.tip: Provide some provincial interfaces based on national medical insurance standards and SM2 SM3 SM4 algorithm.

Quickly parse and generate JSON, providing efficient datawindow-based import and export. nThe most worthwhile function is that when there is subJSON and arrays, you can use the symbol / to directly obtain member values, without layer by layer parsing. The efficiency and speed of processing JSON by this object is the fastest in the PB world, on par with PB2019's JSON.

Quickly parse and generate JSON, providing efficient datawindow-based import and export. nThe most worthwhile function is that when there is subJSON and arrays, you can use the symbol / to directly obtain member values, without layer by layer parsing. The efficiency and speed of processing JSON by this object is the fastest in the PB world, on par with PB2019's JSON.
BSON file and data parsing and generation, efficient and convenient.
XML file and string parsing and generation, efficient and convenient.
Provides HttpClient access. Based on WinHttp and libcurl, respectively.

Provides data access based on WinHttp HTTP/HTTPS protocol, encapsulates download and upload functions, can directly transfer JSON objects, and automatically transcodes UTF8. nIt can completely replace the system's XMLHTTP object function, only stronger and more convenient.

Provides data access based on libcurl-based HTTP/HTTPS protocol, encapsulates download and upload functions, can directly transfer JSON objects, and automatically transcodes UTF8. nIt can completely replace the system's XMLHTTP object function, only stronger and more convenient.

Implement commonly used functions based on OpenSSL. n1. RSA public key and private key generation, encryption and decryption, signing, and verification. n2. CRC32 CRC16 CRC8 check. n3. MD5, SHA, SM3, base64, urlencode/urldecode, timestamp and many other codec functions. n4. AES, DES, 3DES, SM4 and many other encryption and decryption functions. nThe above can be used to complete most e-commerce signing, encryption and decryption work.

An FTP server is provided to share native files to other clients.
An FTP client based on the libftp library implemented entirely from the underlying protocol. IS DIFFERENT FROM WINAPI-BASED FTP CLIENTS IN THAT IT PROVIDES MORE DETAILED CONTROL.

An FTP client based on the libftp library implemented entirely from the underlying protocol. IS DIFFERENT FROM WINAPI-BASED FTP CLIENTS IN THAT IT PROVIDES MORE DETAILED CONTROL. nThis is an FTP client manager that mimics the resource manager implementation. Double-click the file in the explorer to edit and automatically update it to the server.

FTP client based on the ssh protocol, abbreviated as sftp. nIn addition to file upload and download, you can also execute operating system commands on the server, which is equivalent to incorporating the SSH function.

A map is an associative container that stores elements consisting of a combination of a key-value Key and a mapped value Value, in a specific order. This is a very useful tool. Key-value Key is typically used to sort and uniquely identify elements, while the mapped value Value stores the content associated with this key-value Key. n2. Elements are always sorted by their key, Key. nVery useful when saving data like a data dictionary. nasn1 encoding encodes data into binary to facilitate packaging of unformatted data.
Powerful binary data processing that goes far beyond blob types.

A fast and efficient string handling object, especially in many string concatenation operations, is up to fifty times faster than string variable operations. nIn addition to the functions of finding and replacing, other special functions are:n1.Regular expression search, matching, and replacement. n2. Large text is processed by line. n3. Character set conversion. n4.Read and write text files directlyn5.String splitting. n6.Console output debugging function.

Provides compression and decompression in ZIP format. nIn addition to compressing and decompressing files, you can also add BLOB data to the compressed package, or read the contents of the compressed file into BLOB variables.
Provides data stream compression and decompression. Supports compressing and decompressing .gz format files.

Numerous database connection support is available. Fast and efficient access to databases and result sets. The supported connection methods and databases are:n1. ODBCn2. Microsoft SQL Servern3. Oraclen4. InterBase/Firebirdn5. SQLBasen6. DB2n7. Sybasen8. MySQLn9. PostgreSQLn10. SQLiten11. SQLAnywere
PB's own database is improved, and it supports functions such as disconnection detection
DBF file import and export, support more than 1000 columns.
Parse the oracle TNS file in JSON format, which is convenient to use.

A key-value database is a non-relational database that uses a simple key-value approach to storing data. A key-value database stores data as a collection of key-value pairs, where the key acts as a unique identifier。

A less common PDF file reading control (not OCX). nFunctions are:n1.Load PDF, print and save, just like the content displayed on the front page. n2.Convert PDF to image. n3.Convert PDF to plain text content, you can get every word. n4.Add a picture at the specified location. n5.Add a handwritten signature. n6.dw2pdf Generate PDFs and images.
